name: Loopar Introduction
doc_structure:
[{"element":"menu_content","data":{"id":"menu_content1_el702527834072","name":"menu_content1_el702527834072","label":"Menu_content1","key":"menu_content1_el702527834072"},"elements":[{"element":"div","data":{"label":"Overview","key":"div118_el402126158388","background_image":[],"id":"div118_el402126158388","name":"div118_el402126158388"},"elements":[{"element":"title","data":{"label":"Title2","key":"title2_el1409034387696","text":"Overview","background_image":[],"id":"title2_el1409034387696","name":"title2_el1409034387696"},"imageProps":{},"style":{}},{"element":"markdown","data":{"name":"markdown2_el128606491111","label":"Markdown2","key":"markdown2_el128606491111","value":"Loopar is a revolutionary **full-stack drag-and-drop framework** designed to simplify and accelerate web development. It offers an intuitive graphical interface, eliminating complex integrations and enabling visual project design with full control over elements and interactions.

With a modular approach and integrated tools, Loopar adapts to various project types, from simple blogs to complex data management systems. Its drag-and-drop interface allows effortless content creation using predefined blocks, Markdown, or custom designs. For advanced projects, Loopar automates database model creation, controller setup, and view rendering, freeing developers from repetitive tasks to focus on business logic.

Installing Loopar is as simple as running a single command in the console. Once installed, the entire development process is handled through a user-friendly graphical interface in your browser. This streamlined approach ensures that the framework is easy and intuitive to use from the very first moment.

> Thanks to modern technologies like Vite, React, and Tailwind CSS, Loopar is both lightweight and powerful, delivering high performance and a seamless development experience. Combined with support for multiple databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, and SQLite, Loopar empowers developers with the tools, flexibility, and efficiency needed to bring their ideas to life.","background_image":[],"id":"markdown2_el128606491111"},"imageProps":{},"style":{}}],"imageProps":{},"style":{}},{"element":"div","data":{"label":"Features","key":"div37_el433976238488","id":"features","background_image":[],"name":"div37_el433976238488"},"elements":[{"element":"title","data":{"label":"Title7","key":"title7_el208383716780","text":"Features","background_image":[],"size":"md","id":"title7_el208383716780","name":"title7_el208383716780"},"imageProps":{},"style":{}},{"element":"markdown","data":{"label":"Markdown40","key":"markdown40_el97101058058","value":"## Recursiveness in Loopar  

Loopar is a self-recursive framework, designed to build and enhance itself. Every entity within the system, whether core entities like **Builders** or auxiliary entities like **Model** and **App**, originates from the **Entity** model. Remarkably, even the **Entity** model itself is an entity created and managed by the **Entity** model.  

This recursive architecture is evident when navigating to the entities list (`desk/entity/list`), where you can find a record named **Entity**. This record represents the **Entity** model as an entity of itself, encapsulating the idea of self-referential design.  

This self-recursive nature makes Loopar uniquely innovative, enabling the framework to modify and extend its own functionality dynamically. By allowing users to iteratively improve and expand the system from within, Loopar fosters exponential growth in development capabilities. While this approach introduces complexity, it also provides unparalleled flexibility and adaptability, making it a powerful tool for building advanced systems.","background_image":[],"id":"markdown40_el97101058058","name":"markdown40_el97101058058"},"imageProps":{},"style":{}},{"element":"row","data":{"label":"Row3","key":"row3_el686554746264","background_image":[],"layout":"[50,50]","id":"row3_el686554746264","name":"row3_el686554746264"},"elements":[{"element":"col","data":{"label":"Col9","key":"col9_el19643310876","animation":"fade-right","id":"col9_el19643310876","name":"col9_el19643310876"},"elements":[{"element":"text_block_icon","data":{"label":"Text_block_icon1","key":"text_block_icon1_el449531340283","background_image":[],"title":"Organized and Scalable Code","icon":"Code","text":"Enjoy the benefits of a well-organized code structure that supports scalability. Loopar helps you keep your actions, models, and public files neatly separated, making your projects easier to manage and expand.

* [**React**](https://react.dev/)
* [**Tailwind**](https://tailwindcss.com/)
* [**Vite**](https://vite.dev/)","id":"markdown14_el172471036491","name":"markdown14_el172471036491"},"imageProps":{},"style":{}},{"element":"markdown","data":{"label":"Benefits","key":"markdown22_el529610221361","value":"# Benefits
### Time and Resource Savings
Simplify the development and maintenance of complex web applications without sacrificing quality or functionality. Loopar helps you save time and resources by streamlining the development process.

### Accessible for Everyone
Loopar is ideal for both experienced developers and beginners. Its intuitive and visual approach makes it easy for anyone to start creating and managing web projects, regardless of their technical expertise.

### Enhanced Collaboration
Improve collaboration between design and development teams by providing a common and accessible platform. Loopar fosters better communication and coordination, leading to more cohesive and successful projects.","id":"benefits","name":"markdown22_el529610221361"},"imageProps":{},"style":{}}],"imageProps":{},"style":{}}],"imageProps":{},"style":{}}]
